mapper.select: SELECT category_name categoryName, cashbook_kind cashbookKind FROM category WHERE cashbook_kind=#{cashbookKind} ORDER BY cashbookKind ASC
SELECT YEAR(cashbook_date) year, SUM(cashbook_price) revenue FROM cashbook WHERE category_name=#{categoryName} AND cashbook_kind='수입' GROUP BY YEAR(cashbook_date)
SELECT YEAR(cashbook_date) year, SUM(cashbook_price) expenditure FROM cashbook WHERE category_name=#{categoryName} AND cashbook_kind='지출' GROUP BY YEAR(cashbook_date)

SELECT YEAR(cashbook_date) year, MIN(case when cashbook_kind='수입' then cashbook_price END) min, MAX(case when cashbook_kind='수입' then cashbook_price END) max FROM cashbook GROUP BY YEAR(cashbook_date)

SELECT YEAR(cashbook_date) year, MIN(case when cashbook_kind='지출' then cashbook_price END) min, MAX(case when cashbook_kind='지출' then cashbook_price END) max FROM cashbook GROUP BY YEAR(cashbook_date)
SELECT YEAR(cashbook_date) year, SUM(cashbook_price) revenue FROM cashbook WHERE cashbook_kind='수입' GROUP BY YEAR(cashbook_date);
SELECT YEAR(cashbook_date) year, SUM(cashbook_price) expenditure FROM cashbook WHERE cashbook_kind='지출' GROUP BY YEAR(cashbook_date);

SELECT YEAR(cashbook_date) year, SUM((case when cashbook_kind='수입' then cashbook_price ELSE 0 END) -(case when cashbook_kind='지출' then cashbook_price ELSE 0 END)) profit FROM cashbook GROUP BY YEAR(cashbook_date);
SELECT DISTINCT YEAR(cashbook_date) year FROM cashbook ORDER BY YEAR(cashbook_date) ASC
SELECT MONTH(cashbook_date) month, SUM(cashbook_price) revenue FROM cashbook WHERE category_name=#{categoryName} AND cashbook_kind='수입' AND YEAR(cashbook_date) = #{year} GROUP BY MONTH(cashbook_date)

SELECT MONTH(cashbook_date) month, SUM(cashbook_price) expenditure FROM cashbook WHERE category_name=#{categoryName} AND cashbook_kind='지출' AND YEAR(cashbook_date) = #{year} GROUP BY MONTH(cashbook_date)

SELECT MONTH(cashbook_date) month, MIN(case when cashbook_kind='수입' then cashbook_price END) min, MAX(case when cashbook_kind='수입' then cashbook_price END) max FROM cashbook WHERE YEAR(cashbook_date) = #{year} GROUP BY MONTH(cashbook_date)

SELECT MONTH(cashbook_date) month, MIN(case when cashbook_kind='지출' then cashbook_price END) min, MAX(case when cashbook_kind='지출' then cashbook_price END) max FROM cashbook WHERE YEAR(cashbook_date) = #{year} GROUP BY MONTH(cashbook_date)
SELECT MONTH(cashbook_date) month, SUM(cashbook_price) revenue FROM cashbook WHERE cashbook_kind='수입' AND YEAR(cashbook_date) = #{year} GROUP BY MONTH(cashbook_date)
SELECT MONTH(cashbook_date) month, SUM(cashbook_price) expenditure FROM cashbook WHERE cashbook_kind='지출' AND YEAR(cashbook_date) = #{year} GROUP BY MONTH(cashbook_date)

SELECT MONTH(cashbook_date) month, SUM((case when cashbook_kind='수입' then cashbook_price ELSE 0 END) -(case when cashbook_kind='지출' then cashbook_price ELSE 0 END)) profit FROM cashbook WHERE YEAR(cashbook_date) = #{year} GROUP BY MONTH(cashbook_date)
